Author: eastsidegringo
Title: Recycle it Your Own Damn Self!
Content: I'm always looking for ways to reduce but I recently discovered a way to reuse before I recycle. It's a system called the 'scratch tray' and it's very straightforward. First you save all of the paper you would normally recycle (unless it has sensitive info on it, but those you would probably shred anyway). Then you....

Author: corentin
Content: I don't trust corporations more than I trust governments.

Author: epi0Bauqu
Content: This is just not true.  Suppose you file the basic incorporation documents provided by your state and you are the sole shareholder.  How exactly will that provide you with "no protection in court" or "hurt you big time if you end up going big?"

Author: staunch
Title: Web 2.0 Is A Gift, Not A Threat, To VCs

Author: extantproject
Content: I think this is saying that YC would rather not have to make legal changes to an existing company (i.e. it's more likely that you'll be funded by YC if you let them take care of the legal junk).

Author: extantproject
Content:
Yes.

The key to not working overtime is to not work overtime. Don't be a wimp. I like a phrase I stole from "Lost in Translation":

"I have a previous commitment."
